=======================
Changes for stxnext.log
=======================

2008/07/07 0.1.0:
=================

- initial release

2008/07/07 0.1.1:
=================

- fix UnicodeEncodeError when trying to log unicode object

2008/10/24 0.1.2:
=================

- write log file in correct directory if instance using buildout

2008/10/24 0.1.2.1:
=================

- write log file in correct directory if instance using buildout - fix

2009/03/26 0.2.0:
=================

- append data from Zope2 request object to log
